description: Schema definition for describing bureau IT leaders for an agency.
title: Bureau IT Leadership Directory Schema version 1.0

___leaders.name: leaders
___leaders.description: A directory of the bureau IT leaders for this agency
___leaders.title: Leaders schema.

___employmentTypeOther.name: employmentTypeOther
___employmentTypeOther.description: When employtmentType Other was chosen, this field contains a description of the employment type.
___employmentTypeOther.title: EmploymentTypeOther schema.

___evaluationRatingOfficialTitle.name: evaluationRatingOfficialTitle
___evaluationRatingOfficialTitle.description: The title of the leader's evaluation rating official.
___evaluationRatingOfficialTitle.title: EvaluationRatingOfficialTitle schema.

___typeOfAppointment.name: typeOfAppointment
___typeOfAppointment.description: The type of appointment for this leader.  Must be either career or political.
___typeOfAppointment.title: TypeOfAppointment schema.

___evaluationReviewingOfficialTitle.name: evaluationReviewingOfficialTitle
___evaluationReviewingOfficialTitle.description: The title of the leader's evaluation reviwing official..
___evaluationReviewingOfficialTitle.title: EvaluationReviewingOfficialTitle schema.

___bureauCode.name: bureauCode
___bureauCode.description: 2 digit integer bureau code, per A-11 Appendix C: https://www.whitehouse.gov/sites/default/files/omb/assets/a11_current_year/app_c.pdf
___bureauCode.title: BureauCode schema.

___keyBureauCIO.name: keyBureauCIO
___keyBureauCIO.description: Set this field to Yes if this leader a key bureau CIO.
___keyBureauCIO.title: KeyBureauCIO schema.

___otherResponsibilities.name: otherResponsibilities
___otherResponsibilities.description: Description of other responsibilities of this leader.
___otherResponsibilities.title: OtherResponsibilities schema.

___employmentType.name: employmentType
___employmentType.description: Employment type.  One of GS, SES, SL, ST, or Other.
___employmentType.title: EmploymentType schema.
